snippet: More than 125 others were injured when the train’s engine and four of its 20 cars derailed after they emerged from a tunnel in the Raigad district.
abstract: Passenger train derails in western India, killing at least 18 people and injuring more than 125.
lead_paragraph: More than 125 others were injured when the train’s engine and four of its 20 cars derailed after they emerged from a tunnel in the Raigad district.

headline.main: Train Derails in India, Killing at Least 18
headline.print_headline: Train Derails in India, Killing at Least 18
